oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First day of legal liquor sales in Davidson County, Tennessee, 1939
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the first day of legal liquor sales in Davidson County, Tennessee. In 1939 the Tennessee legislature first provided for the sale of alcoholic beverages on a local option basis. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Liquor stores--Tennessee--Nashville; Alcohol; Liquors; Drinking of alcoholic beverages--Tennessee--Nashville; Business enterprises--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
